author: Kyle Brown
comment: Nice looking app I must say, quite clean.  An issue and a few thoughts. One, the "application" that gets installed to the wear device is called "My Application". I also almost always have the battery notification on my wear device. I'd rather have it configurable from the phone to send a notification at various thresholds. That plus on-demand checking by launching the Battery Wear app from the wear device itself. Otherwise, good start!
title: Looks nice, needs some work still.

author: Kanese Goins
comment: The app works great when u 1st open it. After a while, tho, I notice that it stops sending notifications. I have to reopen the app on my phone to get it working again, then the cycle starts all over...
title: When it works
